song_lyrics: Sakhī Shāmshu letā sukh, ramatā je rangmā... 1
Sakhī sambhārtā e sukh, fāṭe mārī chhātaḍī;
Sakhī kyāre besī sanamukh, karashu vātaḍī... 2
Sakhī āṇi ānkhe Alabel, josu jo jīvanne;
Sakhī chhogalā vāḷo chhel, malye sukh manne... 3
Sakhī maḷashu bharī jyāre bāth, shok to meṭashu;
Sakhī Niṣhkuḷānandno Nāth, male dukh meṭashu... 4
title: Sakhī Māhā māse mahā dukh upanu angmā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1196: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
